snippet.title: Chris and the Badgers - FREE Android game
snippet.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ashumbesher.chrisandthebadgers

Here is a gameplay sample of the first Android game I developed and published, Chris and the Badgers.

Download for your Android device via this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ashumbesher.chrisandthebadgers

See you on the leaderboard!
